document.full_text: british reggae star smiley culture has died during a police raid in southern england, media outlets reported on tuesday, and the death is being investigated by the independent police complaints commission.
document.title: uk reggae star dies in police raid: reports
lines_and_colors: british reggae star smiley culture has died during a police raid in southern england, media outlets reported on tuesday, and the death is being investigated by the independent police complaints commission.
